title: Adi kristu uNmai kaNDa
sahitya:
Adi kristu uNmai kaNDa sAdhu sundar singh ANDavana aruLai vENDi anbu sheidanan


anupallavi

  mEdiniyil viNNarasu mEva nOTranan minnaiya ponnoLirum mEni peTranan


caraNam    kAdalAgik-kasind-urugum kaDavuL Arvamum kanivinAl uLattaiyaLLum kAnta shorkkaLum
sAdal vEdal nOdalellAm sahikku nenjamum samarasa orumaiyum jagattin mun viLakkinAn
